scripts.test: cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test tests/qetest/faqtests.spec.ts --project chromium
scripts.test:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/qetest/faqtests.spec.ts -g "Link Shop"--project chromium --headed
scripts.test:stage1: cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test tests/qetest/faqtests.spec.ts -g "Link PartnerformsLink" --project chromium --headed
scripts.test:stage: cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test tests/qetest/faqtests.spec.ts --project chromium --headed
